title: S15 Ep53: The Black Monk of Pontefract with Richard Estep
itunes:title: The Black Monk of Pontefract with Richard Estep
description:
Darkness Radio have a terrifying brush with The Black Monk of Pontefract with guest Richard Estep

This is an incredible case of a dark manifestation, items vanishing and mysterious items appearing, plus chilling encounters with an otherworldly force that seems to defy all explanation and continues today!
